issue.title: [C++] arrow::PrettyPrint for Table instances
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3108](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3108). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Extend the `arrow::PrettyPrint` functionality to also support `arrow::Table` instances in addition to `RecordBatch`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3108?focusedCommentId=16679325) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2857
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2857>
